name: Kaiqi Huang
content: 黄凯奇-中国科学院大学-UCAS [中文] [English] Honors & Distinctions Publications Research Interests Research Grants Students Research Areas Academy Activities General Dr. Huang received his BSc and MSc from Nanjing University of Science Technology, China and obtained his PhD degree from Southeast University. He has worked in National Lab. of Pattern Recognition (NLPR), Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Science (CASIA), China since 2004, and he has been an  full professor in NLPR from 2011. He is IEEE Senior member and deputy general secretary of IEEE Beijing Section (2006-2008). Dr. Huang has initiated, set direction and managed successfully many leading-edge research projects, including National Science Foundation of China, National High Technology Research and Development Program("863"Program) of China, and many International collaborative projects. He serves as over forty technique program committee members of international conference. Since 2007, Dr. Huang has been a regular independent expert evaluator and reviewer for National Science Foundation of China (NSFC)) on research grant application and project progress appraisal; he is an executive team member of IEEE SMC Cognitive Computing Committee as well as Associate Editor of IEEE Trans on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics: Systems (TSMC), Pattern Recognition(PR), International Journal of image and graphics (IJIG) and many Guest Editors of journals such as TSMC, Signal Processing, PRL and so on. He has obtained many awards such as CCF&IEEE CS Young Conputer Scientist Award(2016), The Ten Outstanding Young  Scientist of Chinese Academy of Science (2017), The ImageNet Chanllege First Prize in image object localization  task (additional data) (2014), the PASCAL VOC First Prize in Object Detection Task (2010,2011)，Second Prize of National Science and Technology Progress Award in 2010. His current research interests include visual surveillance、image understanding, pattern recognition and biological based vision and son on. He has published over 200 papers in the important international journals and conference such as IEEE TIPAMI, T-IP, T-SMC-B, TCSVT, Pattern Recognition (PR), Computer Vision and Image Understanding (CVIU), ICCV, ECCV, CVPR, ICIP, ICPR. Experience Work Experience Visiting Professor  2015-2016,          Oxford University, Department of Science and EngineeringProfessor Oct. 2011-Present         National Lab. of Pattern Recognition (NLPR), Institute of Automation, Chinese Academy of Science (CASIA),China Asso.Prof. Dec. 2005-Oct. 2011      NLPR,CASIA,China Postdoc. Chen et al), Chinese Conference on Pattern Recognition, 2012. 8. the Excellent Young Scholars Award of National Science Foundation of China (NSFC)，2013 9.
